page.title: 04Legal Matters.
page.content: Part of the area is in Hereford/ Worcester and is policed from Ledbury. The rest is policed by the Officer in Charge at Staunton, who works eight hour shifts. Additional cover comes from Newent and from the Gloucester sub-divisional headquarters at Lydney. The sub-division is under the control of a Superintendent. The Gloucester Division is the responsibility of a Chief Superintendent. The local officer's work is varied. Recently, he has dealt with several road accidents, an abandoned puppy, cases of forced entry into cars and problems with vandals and poachers. He is responsible for checking shotgun licences, farm animal movements and other tasks. He also visits the three schools in his large district as part of his public relations duties. He uses a police motor-cycle or bicycle.
